name: Store Simulator
description:
Description:

This is a game where you can lead your store. You can buy supplies , sell them , build your store and more!

Tutorial:

First you have to buy supplies . To do this head to the Desk with laptop and press E .  Select with one you want and buy it.

Remember to have Storage Shelf . They give you a space to store the bought items . 

Then you can spread the supply out on the shelves. Just simply walk to them , press E and select which item you want to place on shelf.

Next wait for the Customer to arrive . Usually it takes about 15 to 20 secounds

After it head to the Cash Register and hold E to service a customer.

Build:

To enter Build Mode get close to the Sign and press E.  In Build Mode you  can place walls , doors , shelfs  etc.

Controls in Build Mode:

Look - Hold RMB

Rotate - Q and E

Delete Mode - X

Exit - E or ESC

Move - WSAD

Down - CTRL 

Up - SPACE

Help - H
